    C

    Card - Class in JEST.model.cards
    This is a general card : we define the Trophy of the card, and declare abstract the methods to get the face value and the suit (we define them if it is a SuitCard.
    Card(Trophy) - Constructor for class JEST.model.cards.Card
    A card is defined by its Trophy.
    CardVisitor - Interface in JEST.model.cards
    This interface allows access to the scores obtained by the SuitCards or the JokerCard.
    chooseOffer(List, PlayerRouter) - Method in class JEST.model.Player
    The REAL player is asked to choose the player whose offer they want to receive, and then which card they want to receive (face down or face up).
    chooseOffer(List, PlayerRouter) - Method in class JEST.model.virtualPlayer.VirtualPlayer
    The virtual player chooses an offer under his strategy.
    chooseOffer(VirtualPlayer, List) - Method in class JEST.model.virtualPlayer.AgressiveStrategy
    We compute the points of each face-up cards in the other offers.
    chooseOffer(VirtualPlayer, List) - Method in class JEST.model.virtualPlayer.DefensiveStrategy
    We compute the points of each face-up cards in the other offers.
    chooseOffer(VirtualPlayer, List) - Method in class JEST.model.virtualPlayer.RandomStrategy
    He chooses randomly a card among all the cards available (the face-up and the face-down cards).
    chooseOffer(VirtualPlayer, List) - Method in interface JEST.model.virtualPlayer.Strategy
    The virtual player chooses an offer according to his strategy.
    ChooseOfferPanel - Class in JEST.view
    Panel allowing a player to choose a card from available offers.
    ChooseOfferPanel(MainWindow) - Constructor for class JEST.view.ChooseOfferPanel
    Constructor for the offer selection panel.
    clear() - Method in class JEST.view.ChooseOfferPanel
    Resets the panel after a selection.
    clear() - Method in class JEST.view.MakeOfferPanel
    Resets the panel after a card selection.
    clearLogs() - Method in class JEST.view.MainWindow
    Clears all log messages from the log area.
